error.defaultMessage: Error! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error.PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
error.PasswordRequiresDigit: Password must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
error.PasswordRequiresUpper: Password must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
error.PasswordRequiresLower: Password must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
error.EmailTaken: This email address is already taken.
error.KvkExists: This Kvk number is already registered.
error.IncorrectPassword: Incorrect password. Please check your password and try again.
error.UserNotFound: No user found with the provided email address.
error.PasswordMismatch: Password and confirmation password do not match.

success.UserHasBeenCreated: Your account has been successfully created. You can now log in.
success.UserHasLoggedIn: You have successfully logged in. Redirecting you to the portal.
